document.full_text: rafa nadal had doubted he could seal a sixth french open title having started in shaky form and with rivals looking imperious, but the spaniard need not have worried after triumphing with another claycourt masterclass.
document.title: nadal's grip on title and federer tightens
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal had doubted he could seal a sixth french open title having started in shaky form and with rivals looking imperious, but the spaniard need not have worried after triumphing with another claycourt masterclass.
